text: XX could become an astronaut due to her determination; we can at least dream about it
We can dream of becoming like XX and XX only if we study sincerely
Good education will help us get a good job
Education ensures a good future for every home
comments: assuming they refer to a good future supported by a paid job

text: Education is the key to good life
comments: assuming they refer to a good life supported by a paid job

text: Degrees don’t do any harm; on the contrary the more the degrees better will our chances of getting a good well-paying job
Both young men and women should get opportunity to work in government job
The better the job greater will be our chance to lead a good life

We are still studying
	But we will all get married soon so we cannot do much
We can dream of becoming XX or XX but in reality this will always remain a distant dream for girls of our village
But of course we will always think that given the right opportunities we could have become engineers and doctors like the city girls
keyword: could have become engineers and doctors

text: No, no girl works at the factory
keyword: no girl works at the factory

text: Most girls sit at home and then get married
One should make use of education; what is the point in doing agriculture after doing master’s?
Some girls work at the factory
Most young men work at the factory or in agriculture
comments: the female respondents did not specify aspirations for boys but we assumed these to be for (white or blue collar) paid jobs

text: Some men have joined the army
comments: the female respondents did not specify aspirations for boys but we assumed these to be for (white or blue collar) paid jobs

text:
Young women will be lost since they will not know where to begin
	It will be impossible for them to do it
comments: this is about selling produce in a nearby market place

text: Women don’t know how to trade at the market; they have never done it and will easily be cheated
keyword: don’t know how to trade at the market
comments: this is about selling produce in a market place

text: She has to return home before dark; she will be constrained by many factors including lack of knowledge about the market prices
keyword: lack of knowledge about the market prices
comments: this is about selling produce in a market place

text: XX is not a decent place for woman
Parents will never allow them and they will be severely reprimanded
comments: this is about selling produce in a nearby market place

text: Parents want their girls to stay indoors after school
So while they can help raise livestock at home they cannot go out to sell milk
keyword: cannot go out to sell milk

text: But mostly young women are not supposed to work outside their home
keyword: not supposed to work outside their home

text: Parents don’t consider it safe for young girls to go out and do something on their own more so now when boys are drinking and doping so much
keyword: don’t consider it safe for young girls to go out

text: He will never let her sell; xx (market) is not a place for good women (all respondents agreed on this)
keyword: (market) is not a place for good women

text: Girls don’t roam around alone much
It is not easy for young women to move around alone
keyword: not easy for young women to move around alone

text: The story doesn’t change much post marriage; she still has to listen to her husband and in laws
keyword: listen to her husband and in laws

text: Before marriage a girl is under her parents thumbs while post marriage this role is taken by her husband; so things hardly change
Boys are the problem and not girls; boys make it unsafe for girls to move around freely
keyword: boys make it unsafe for girls

text: Now parents fear more since an increasing number of boys are taking to drugs
Boys stand here and there in groups and pass obscene comments which makes it tough for girls to move around
keyword: tough for girls to move around

text: Most young men want to work in a city but young women will not be allowed
keyword: young women will not be allowed

text: Young women cannot migrate for work
Young women don’t have much freedom since society has many evil elements
We have to get married and then we can go wherever we want with our husband
keyword: go wherever we want with our husband

text: Some parents allow their girls to go while some don’t
She can go out only with her husband or with some older woman of the family like her mother in law
keyword: go out only with her husband or with some older woman

text: Girls don’t do any agricultural work
keyword: Girls don’t do any agricultural work

text: We are not supposed to go work in the fields; some of us are learning tailoring at home
We help our mothers at home but don’t do any agricultural work
Boys do all agricultural work
Boys drive tractors too; actually they should learn farming because then at least one means of livelihood is assured for them
Women don’t use machines
Earlier many women were involved in sowing and harvesting but now zero tiller and combine do their work
So women have more time for household work and family

Young women don’t do any agricultural work
Only boys do
keyword: women don’t do any agricultural work

text: Parents also don’t want their girls to go and work in the fields
keyword: don’t want their girls to go and work in the fields

text:
Young women don’t do any agricultural activities
	They have never done
keyword: women don’t do any agricultural activities

text: There are no enabling factors for women to do agriculture
they [women] don’t do any agricultural work
Men go to their plot everyday at least twice and thrice during the harvesting season to ensure that everything is well
keyword: Men go to their plot everyday at least twice and thrice

text: Many women carry their husband’s lunch to the plot

Adam will not let her join; women are supposed to stay at home
	He will definitely not allow her (5 respondents said this)

He will still ask for her help
The fact that he has allowed her to work on her own vegetable garden does not in any way imply that she can shirk her other responsibilities
In fact he will make her feel obliged to help him since he has agreed to let her work

David will sell (unanimous response)
Women are not seen at the marketplace
older women and poor women do farming because they need the money
keyword: farming because they need the money

text: Some women go to supervise the work on their plot once in a while and only if their husbands are away

All family members work on the family plot
	The plot gives food to the entire family so all members want to contribute to growing a good crop
	Now machines do a lot of work but earlier during paddy sowing season the entire family minus daughters could be found on the plot
keyword: entire family minus daughters could be found on the plot

text: There is usually single plot
Women don’t have their own separate plot
keyword: Women don’t have their own separate plot

text: Because only boys are heard in our society
comments: this is a follow up to E.35. where all participants said it would be (very) difficult for a woman to pursue her decision to buy a plot of land with inherited money

text: Men are the boss in the family and though she will try her best to reason with him he will in all likelihood do whatever he wants
comments: this is a follow up to E.35. where all participants said it would be (very) difficult for a woman to pursue her decision to buy a plot of land with inherited money

text: Even young girls when they get married are told by their mothers to be nice to their husbands and listen to them
keyword: be nice to their husbands and listen to them
comments: this is a follow up to E.35. where all participants said it would be (very) difficult for a woman to pursue her decision to buy a plot of land with inherited money

text: If he wants a motorcycle he will go and buy it without even bothering to inform his wife
keyword: without even bothering to inform his wife
comments: this is a follow up to E.35. where all participants said it would be (very) difficult for a woman to pursue her decision to buy a plot of land with inherited money

text: Men can do whatever they want; they don’t need their wives’ permission for anything
comments: this is a follow up to E.35. where all participants said it would be (very) difficult for a woman to pursue her decision to buy a plot of land with inherited money

text: Mark will be very happy for her and encourage her further
comments: this is about woman earning income through successful  small enterprise, which I why I decided to include it here as norm speaking to (financial) assets

text: Since he doesn’t work himself so he will be happy with her success; had he been working he might not have appreciated his wife doing better than him
comments: this is about woman earning income through successful  small enterprise, which I why I decided to include it here as norm speaking to (financial) assets

text: If he has allowed her to have a vegetable garden of her own then why would he object to her joining a group of women doing the same thing?
keyword: why would he object to her joining
comments: assuming the local group of women is to share information and experience

text: If she joins she will learn new things and ways to do better in her vegetable garden and so Adam will not object
This is unique situation; many women work but for a man to sit at home while his wife works is beyond my comprehension
People may understand that Mary may be working to support her family but no one can forgive Mark for sitting at home
older women will say stuff like she has no control over her husband etc
keyword: say stuff like she has no control

text: Community will speak ill of Mary and say that she is not a good wife
Mary will be blamed by people for this ironic situation in her family
People will call him all sorts of names and abuse him
keyword: call him all sorts of names

text: They will tell him to go and suicide for being such a worthless fellow
If my neighbors saw me going out alone they would immediately comment that I was being so brash to do such a thing
People may understand that Mary may be working to support her family
People will tell Mary to reason with her husband
His bets friends will try to reason with him to go and earn a living and take care of family a task that is being done by his wife now
But any woman who wants to do so must necessarily consult he husband and take his permission
She would have to ask her in laws too
They will decide together
David will let Diana decide since she is the best judge of how much she needs for her family
Yes, this will not be an issue; Diana will keep what she needs and David will sell the rest
David will have faith in her idea since she knows agriculture and so he will let her make the change
keyword: will let her make the change

text: They will do it together; David will not have a problem since this change is expected to bring in more profits
We talk of gender equality but it is still a male dominated society even in the rich families
comments: this is with reference to a woman making a decision about using inherited money to buy land

text: Both should be allowed to study as much as they want and get as many degress as they want
keyword: Both [boys and girls] should be allowed to study as much as they want

text: Men and women should be treated at par; they are both human beings
Both should get equal opportunities in every walk of life
The elders in the women reprimand a young girl if she is caught talking to a boy; why is it so? If there is gender equality then we should be allowed to talk to them
keyword: should be allowed to talk to them

text: We are mature enough to distinguish between the right and the wrong
keyword: distinguish between the right and the wrong

text: Earlier female feticide was rampant but it is not so any more; s we are moving towards gender equality
background information: feticide=the act of causing the death of a fetus
comments: I assume the respondent is referring to selective abortion based on gender (missing women)

text:
People should not misinterpret if a young man and woman talk to each other; they are not doing anything wrong
Perceptions need to change in such matters
Women should be encouraged to make an identity of their own
Both should be allowed freedom of choice and expression
